// TEXCOORD                 3     z         2     NONE   float

// Constant buffer to DX9 shader constant mappings:
//

    ps_2_x
    def c2, 1, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999
    def c3, 0.769230783, 1, 0, 0
    dcl t1.xyz  // input<8,9,16>
    dcl_2d s0

#line 60 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\functions.hlsl"
    mov_sat r0.w, c1.w
    add r0.x, -r0.w, c2.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c0.x  // ::locAccentuationFactor<0>

#line 9 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\Sprite\SpritePixelShader.hlsl"
    texld r1, t1, s0  // ::textureColor<0,1,2,3>

#line 62 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\functions.hlsl"
    dp3 r0.y, r1, c2.yzww  // ::inputGrayScaled<0>
    lrp r2.w, c3.x, c3.y, r0.y  // ::inputGrayScaled<0>
    lrp r3.xyz, r0.x, r2.w, r1  // ::output<0,1,2>
    mov r3.w, r1.w
    mov oC0, r3  // ::main<0,1,2,3>

// approximately 9 instruction slots used (1 texture, 8 arithmetic)
ps_4_0
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[1], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[7], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb2[6], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_input_ps linear v2.xy
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 2
//
// Initial variable locations:
//   v0.x <- input.pos.x; v0.y <- input.pos.y; v0.z <- input.pos.z; v0.w <- input.pos.w; 
//   v1.x <- input.col.x; v1.y <- input.col.y; v1.z <- input.col.z; v1.w <- input.col.w; 
//   v2.x <- input.tex.x; v2.y <- input.tex.y; 
//   v3.x <- input.normal.x; v3.y <- input.normal.y; v3.z <- input.normal.z; 
//   v4.x <- input.pos3D.x; v4.y <- input.pos3D.y; v4.z <- input.pos3D.z; 
//   v2.z <- input.texFact;

//
#line 60 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\functions.hlsl"
mov_sat r0.x, cb2[5].w
add r0.x, -r0.x, l(1.000000)
mul r0.y, r0.x, cb1[6].x  // r0.y <- locAccentuationFactor

#line 66
mad r0.x, -r0.x, cb1[6].x, l(1.000000)

#line 9 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\Sprite\SpritePixelShader.hlsl"
sample r1.xyzw, v2.xyxx, t0.xyzw, s0  // r1.x <- textureColor.x; r1.y <- textureColor.y; r1.z <- textureColor.z; r1.w <- textureColor.w

#line 62 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\functions.hlsl"

add r0.w, -r0.z, l(1.000000)
mad r0.z, r0.w, l(0.769231), r0.z
mul r1.xyz, r0.xxxx, r1.xyzx

#line 17 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\Sprite\SpritePixelShader.hlsl"

#line 66 "D:\Projects\GitHub\RolandKoenig\FrozenSky\FrozenSky.Multimedia\Resources\Shaders\functions.hlsl"
mad o0.xyz, r0.zzzz, r0.yyyy, r1.xyzx
